The knight planted on e5 is now unsupported, but it has plenty of jump moves—taking a bishop with Nd7+ looks gaudy, yet the queen is already trained on g7, and  Qxg7 would devastate the kingside.  
So first I lure the queen away with a concrete threat to entice …Kxd7; afterwards Qxg7 cleans up the loose pawns.

[e5d7]
